Package hu.kazocsaba.math.geometry

Immutable geometrical primitives.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Box2
    An axis-aligned 2D rectangle.
    Line
    An infinite line.
    Line2
    A line in 2D space.
    Line3
    A line in 3D space.
    Plane
    An infinite plane.
    Plane3
    An infinite plane in 3D space.
    Segment
    A finite line segment.
    Segment2
    A line segment in 2D space.
    Segment3
    A line segment in 3D space.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DegenerateCaseException
    Thrown when no solution could be returned due to special circumstances.
